description: Stores telemetry data from Jamf-managed Apple devices. Data is updated every 30 minutes.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Identifier for device in MDM Service.

columns.name: NAME
columns.description: Name of the device as defined in Jamf or MDM.

columns.name: UDID
columns.description: UUID referred to the device in Apple ecosystem.

columns.name: COUNTRYID
columns.description: Country ID of the store where the device is assigned.

columns.name: CITY
columns.description: City in the country where the store is located.

columns.name: DONOTDISTURBENABLED
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether Do Not Disturb is enabled for the device.

columns.name: IPADDRESS
columns.description: IP address allocated to the device.

columns.name: LASTENROLLEDDATE
columns.description: Date when the device was last enrolled into MDM services.

columns.name: LASTINVENTORYUPDATEDATE
columns.description: Date when the last inventory update occurred.

columns.name: MANAGED
columns.description: Boolean value indicating if the device is managed by MDM services.

columns.name: OSBUILD
columns.description: OS build number installed on the device.

columns.name: OSVERSION
columns.description: OS version installed on the device.

columns.name: HARDWAREDEVICEID
columns.description: Hardware identifier for the device.

columns.name: MODEL
columns.description: Device model (e.g., iPhone 13).

columns.name: MODELNUMBER
columns.description: Model number assigned to the device.

columns.name: DEVICE_MODEL
columns.description: Device model type (e.g., iPhone, iPad, Mac).

columns.name: SERIALNUMBER
columns.description: Serial number of the device.

columns.name: WIFIMACADDRESS
columns.description: Wi-Fi MAC address of the device.

columns.name: BATTERYLEVEL
columns.description: Battery percentage of the device.

columns.name: LOSTMODEENABLED
columns.description: Boolean value indicating whether Lost Mode is enabled on the device.

columns.name: LOSTMODEENABLEDDATE
columns.description: Date when Lost Mode was enabled on the device.

columns.name: USERNAME
columns.description: Username associated with the device.

columns.name: STORE
columns.description: Store number where the device is allocated.

columns.name: TYPE
columns.description: Type of device (e.g., POS, CFD, Companion, Spare) as defined in the MDM provider.

columns.name: PROFILES
columns.description: Device configuration profiles installed through MDM.

columns.name: SNAPSHOT_TIME
columns.description: Timestamp of the latest data pull from MDM services.

columns.name: TIMEZONE
columns.description: Timezone currently assigned to the device.

columns.name: OS_STATUS
columns.description: Health status of the device's OS version.

columns.name: OFFLINE_STATUS
columns.description: Online/offline status of the device.

columns.name: CERTIFICATE_STATUS
columns.description: Certificate health status, reflecting if any certificate has expired.

columns.name: CERTIFICATES
columns.description: List of installed certificates. Each JSON object may contain: `commonName`, `expirationDate`, `identity`, `status` (e.g., HEALTHY).

columns.name: EXPIRED_CERTIFICATES
columns.description: Count or number of expired certificates on the device.

columns.name: APPLICATION_STATUS
columns.description: Certificate health status, reflecting if any application is outdated`.

columns.name: APPLICATIONS
columns.description: List of installed applications. Each JSON object may contain: `name`, `version`, `identifier`, `IS_KEY_APP`, `IS_OUTDATED`, `status`.

columns.name: DEVICE_HEALTH_STATUS
columns.description: Overall device health derived from certificates, applications, OS versions, and other parameters.

columns.name: DEVICEID
columns.description: Unique auto-incremented identifier for the device record.

columns.name: BATTERY_STATUS
columns.description: Battery health status, reflecting when battery percentage below the threshold

columns.name: DEVICE_RAW_SNAPSHOTTIME
columns.description: Raw timestamp when the snapshot was taken from the MDM system.

columns.name: EXPIREDCERTCOUNT
columns.description: Number of expired certificates.

columns.name: OUTDATEDAPPSCOUNT
columns.description: Number of outdated applications.

columns.name: DEVICE_HEALTH_STATUS_REASONS
columns.description: Reasons why the device is flagged as unhealthy.

columns.name: STORE_NAME
columns.description: Full name of the store to which the device is assigned.

columns.name: DEVICE_TYPE
columns.description: DEVICE_TYPE is Device Type.

columns.name: DEVICE_REASON_CODES
columns.description: Reason Code when device is not healthy.

columns.name: IS_KEY_APP_OUTDATED
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether any key application is outdated.

columns.name: TYPE_WITH_UPPERCASE
columns.description: Auto-generated description for column `TYPE_WITH_UPPERCASE`.
